headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: advertiser_ids
parameters.description: List of advertiser IDs to query. You can obtain Advertiser IDs through the /oauth2/advertiser/get/ endpoint.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A list of information to be returned. If not specified, all information excluding company_name_editable is returned by default. Supported values: telephone_number , contacter , currency , cellphone_number , timezone , advertiser_id , role , company , status , description , rejection_reason , address , name , language , industry , license_no , email , license_url , country , balance , create_time , display_timezone , owner_bc_id , company_name_editable . See the Response section for detailed information on each field. Note : If you include company_name_editable in the value of this field, only company_name_editable along with advertiser_id will be returned and other values will be ignored.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log id of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.

fields.name: list
fields.description: Ad account (advertiser account) list.

fields.name: advertiser_id
fields.description: Advertiser ID.

fields.name: owner_bc_id
fields.description: The ID of a Business Center that the ad account belongs to. Note : This field will be returned only when the below requirements are both met: The user has obtained admin access to the owner Business Center (The Business Center that owns the ad account), and The user has obtained Admin/Operator/Analyst permission for the ad account from the owner Business Center, rather than a partner Business Center.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Ad account status. For enum values, see Enumeration - Advertiser Status . Example: STATUS_ENABLE .

fields.name: role
fields.description: Ad account role. For enum values, , see Enumeration - Advertiser Role . Example: ROLE_ADVERTISER .

fields.name: rejection_reason
fields.description: Reason for rejection.

fields.name: timezone
fields.description: Ad account time zone including GMT offset, or time zone name in the format of "Region/City" (based on the TZ database name conventions ). Example: Etc/GMT , Europe/London .

fields.name: display_timezone
fields.description: Time zone name in the format of "Region/City" (based on the TZ database name conventions . Example: Europe/London .

fields.name: company
fields.description: Ad account's company name.

fields.name: company_name_editable
fields.description: Whether the company name of the ad account can be updated via API. If the value of this field is true , you can use the company field in /advertiser/update/ to update the company name. For non-self-serve advertisers (advertisers directly managed by TikTok representatives), the value of this field will be false . If they want to update the company name, they need to contact their TikTok representatives.

fields.name: industry
fields.description: Ad account industry category code. For enum values, see Industries . Example: 290303 .

fields.name: address
fields.description: Ad account address.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The place of registration code of the ad account. Example: US .

fields.name: advertiser_account_type
fields.description: Type of the ad account. Enum values: RESERVATION (reservation ad account), AUCTION (auction ad account).

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Type of currency used by the ad account, in ISO 4217 code format. Example: EUR .

fields.name: contacter
fields.description: Contact name, in masked format. The name of the person responsible for this account. Example: Te********************nt .

fields.name: email
fields.description: Ad account contact email, in masked format. Example: l***********@************* .

fields.name: cellphone_number
fields.description: Contact mobile number, in masked format.

fields.name: telephone_number
fields.description: Fixed phone number, in masked format.

fields.name: language
fields.description: The code of the language used by the ad account. Example: en .

fields.name: license_no
fields.description: Business license number.

fields.name: license_url
fields.description: Business license preview URL. The link is valid for an hour by default.

fields.name: license_province to-be-deprecated
fields.description: The province where the license was issued.

fields.name: license_city to-be-deprecated
fields.description: The city where the license was issued.

fields.name: promotion_area to-be-deprecated
fields.description: The geographical area where the ad account's promotions are focused.

fields.name: promotion_center_province to-be-deprecated
fields.description: The primary province for the ad account's promotional activities.

fields.name: promotion_center_city to-be-deprecated
fields.description: The primary city for the ad account's promotional activities.

fields.name: brand to-be-deprecated
fields.description: The brand name of the ad account.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Brand description.

fields.name: balance
fields.description: Ad account available balance. The unit is related to the currency of the ad account. Example: 5325.43.

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: The time when the ad account was created, in the format of an Epoch/Unix timestamp in seconds. Example: 1510740064 .

example.body:
{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "OK",
    "request_id": "{{request_id}}",
    "data": {
        "list": [
            {
                "company": "{{company}}",
                "address": null,
                "status": "STATUS_ENABLE",
                "contacter": null,
                "license_province": null,
                "license_city": null,
                "currency": "USD",
                "promotion_area": "0",
                "promotion_center_city": null,
                "cellphone_number": null,
                "timezone": "Etc/GMT+8",
                "description": "{{description}}",
                "rejection_reason": "",
                "advertiser_id": "{{advertiser_id}}",
                "license_no": "{{license_no}}",
                "promotion_center_province": null,
                "name": "{{name}}",
                "industry": "{{industry}}",
                "telephone_number": null,
                "license_url": "{{license_url}}",
                "role": "ROLE_CHILD_ADVERTISER",
                "advertiser_account_type": "AUCTION",
                "create_time": {{create_time}},
                "owner_bc_id": "{{owner_bc_id}}",
                "language": "zh",
                "email": null,
                "country": "CN",
                "balance": 0.0,
                "brand": null,
                "display_timezone": "America/Los_Angeles"
            }
        ]
    }
}
